title: Donjons et Dragons
description: A text-based RPG in Java where players interact through the terminal to explore dungeons, battle enemies and save characters in database.

title: Spiruline Website
description: E-commerce website for selling spirulina-based products. Features suppliers list with filter and a map to locate them.

title: Shop Fruits and Veggies
description: E-commerce site to order fruits and vegetables. Users can filter products, and the back-office allows administrators to manage inventory (add, update, delete products).
